entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Burns Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:22 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023
